markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Dagon (The Shadow in the Sea)](/Deities.aspx?ID=429)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 304

Dagon, the Shadow in the Sea, is the demon lord of aberrance, the ocean, and sea monsters. He holds court in an infinite ocean covered in disconcerting islands and deep-sea trenches filled with incomprehensible sunken cities. He appears as a massive creature with the lower body of an [eel](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=407), a head reminiscent of deep-sea predators, and four thrashing tentacles in place of arms. Dagon began life as a [qlippoth](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=460), and no mortal understands his transformation into a demon lord, though it earned him the enmity of his former kin. Dagon is primarily worshipped by [boggards](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=373), [sedacthies](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=467), and [marsh giants](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3011), though desperate or depraved coastal villages have been known to pledge themselves to the demon lord.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Demon Lords](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=5)

**Edicts** Swim underwater, improve your own strength, encourage the spread of dangerous sea monsters

**Anathema** Break a sworn oath, settle in a landlocked area, share Dagon’s secrets with outsiders

**Area of Concern**
Abberance, the sea, sea monsters

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Constitution

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36)

**Favored Weapon** [Trident](/Weapons.aspx?ID=401)

**Domains** [Change](/Domains.aspx?ID=102), [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=71), [Water](/Domains.aspx?ID=98), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=100)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Abomination](/Domains.aspx?ID=101)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Hydraulic Push](/Spells.aspx?ID=1561)

- **3rd**
[Feet to Fins](/Spells.aspx?ID=1525)

- **6th**
[Chain Lightning](/Spells.aspx?ID=1462)

</column>
name: Dagon (The Shadow in the Sea)
